quotes.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
Before anything else, preparation is the key to success.
Preparation for war is a constant stimulus to suspicion and ill will.
The meeting of preparation with opportunity generates the offspring we call luck.
The best preparation for the future is the present well seen to, and the last duty done.
Thorough preparation makes its own luck.
Today's preparation determines tomorrow's achievement.
My preparation is always mediation and deep breathing. And the rubbing of my hands together just gets my energy going.
By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
Preparation eradicates cowardice, which we define as the failure to act in the midst of fear.
Over-preparation is the foe of inspiration.
The best possible preparation for the future is a well lived present.
Meticulous planning will enable everything a man does to appear spontaneous.
Planning is bringing the future into the present so that you can do something about it now.
Planning ahead is a measure of class. The rich and even the middle class plan for future generations, but the poor can plan ahead only a few weeks or days.
Long-range planning does not deal with future decisions, but with the future of present decisions.
Be over prepared so that you wont under perform.
Proper preparation prevents poor performance.
Prepare yourself in every way you can by increasing your knowledge and adding to your experience, so that you can make the most of opportunity when it occurs.
Preparation for old age should begin not later than one's teens. A life which is empty of purpose until 65 will not suddenly become filled on retirement.
Some people are making such thorough preparation for rainy days that they aren't enjoying today's sunshine.
Imperfect preparation gives rise to the thousand-fold forms that express physical and mental inferiority and insecurity.
Preparation is the be-all of good trial work. Everything else-felicity of expression, improvisational brilliance-is a satellite around the sun. Thorough preparation is that sun.
The best possible preparation of success is empower yourself with trust in self capabilities.
A good preparation takes longer than the delivery.
He who is best prepared can best serve his moment of inspiration.
Preparation is the key to leadership success. The more prepared you are the less your struggle to make it happen and the more your effectiveness!
Preparation doesn't assures victory, it assures confidence.
You cannot move forward in any project, or task, career, relationship or changing a habit unless you plan. And, preparation is not the end but only the beginning.
Prepare while others are daydreaming.
